name: Hive Mind (itch) (EducatedTard)
description:
Submission for GMTK gamejam 2021

The theme was "Joined together".

Concept of the game:

Help the bees in reaching the honeycomb in each level using their mind link connections. You control the queen and instigate the chain of commands. 

Controls:

  • Left arrow: move left
  • Right arrow: move right

Credits:

  • Art, design and programming: Daniel Carmichael
  • Music: Philippe Grant

Play in fullscreen to avoid weird borders!

Thank you for trying the game!!
